title: Essential Oils Class + Holiday Gift Making Workshop!
desc: Hello BEAUTIFUL People! Are you  crafty-n-curious  about  natural forms of health care  as well as interested in  DIY natural health-related products ? Well then, we have a  super-special-aromatic event  just for you! Please join me and one of my favorite essential oils wellness advocates ? ?Amanda Broomel, Founder of Urban Wellness ?? this month at our  Essential Oils Class + Holiday Gift Making Workshop! GIFT MAKING:  We will sample and teach you about the amazing benefits and usages of Essential Oils and then we'll make a  Festive Fall Body Scrub ?that you'll take home at the end of the class ? in a sweet gift bag ? all ready for gifting! We supply the ingredients and you supply your enthusiasm! RSVP without haste because space is limited and will most likely fill up fast! CLASS & WORKSHOP DETAILS Date:  Dec 6, 2015 ~ Sunday Time:  2 - 4 pm Place:  300 S. Santa Fe Ave LA CA 90013  ~? Community Room RSVP:  Must be received by November 30 by 5 pm ~? ***The first 10 registrants will receive a FREE Sample of Holiday Joy Essential Oil!? Cost:  $25? Q's? Text/Call:? 917-613-6874 ***? FREE ?Raffle *** * *** FREE? Vegan Treats and essential oil infused water will be served! *** Share this invite w/ a friend not already invited + get  two RAFFLE entires ! They must RSVP, too!
